memorycardtype: SD, SDHC, and SDXC Memory Card (Eye-Fi card compatible)
lenstype: PENTAX KAF2 bayonet stainless steel mount
batterytype: AA batteries (optional D-LI109 lithium ion battery) battery
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Center, Tracking, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View
imagestablizer: Yes, Sensor-Shift SR (3 stops depending on lens and shooting conditions)
whitebalancing: Custom White Balance (3), White Balance Presets (9)
externalflash: Yes, Hotshoe (P-TTL), high speed sync and wireless w PENTAX dedicated flash
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.5x), No. of Focus Points (11), SDM Function
dustreduction: Yes, Sensor movement w SP coating on low pass filter
flashmodes: Auto, On, Off, Red-eye, Slow Sync, Slow Sync+Redeye, Trailing Curtain Sync, Wireless
display: 3.0 inch TFT LCD monitor with brightness/color adjustment and AR coating
